extendedInfo.description: Texas Hold'em poker. You can play anytime and anywhere. It is completely free. Whether you are playing for the first time or experienced PlayTexas has something for you. Play for fun. Post your score to Facebook, Twitter and our leaderboard. The best offline Texas Holdem Poker around.Can you top our leaderboard?Try it now for free.You can also view our leaderboard online at http://www.gemego.com/pt/lw.php?i=0&f=yFeaturesNo Limit, Limit and Pot Limit settingsHand rankings â click on table to displayRank - view your rank in the world, country, region and town.Leaderboard - view the leaderboard for the world, country, region and city. Post to Facebook and Twitter.Portrait and Landscape support.Backgrounds â marble, wood, or choose your own custom photo.Several styles of card to choose from. Stats - games played, win percentage etc.CommentaryHand AnalysisTrack Progress Links to Poker WikiSettings â many optionsSupport for phone and tablet devicesThis game is ad supported.By downloading you accept the terms of use at www.gemego.com/eula.htmlContact us at contact@gemego.com

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: Ever since the update, there has been a huge number of suck outs.  Before the update, it was realistic.  Now it\'s feels like every other poker site.
reviews.author: Rick Rojas

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Victor Ramiro

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: At first i liked it but as i played i noticed that even if i had a better hand they still won the money. I had an Ace three of a kind and someone beat me with a Queen two of a kind. Rediculous. Please fix.
reviews.author: Alex Schroyer

reviews.title: Pretty good game
reviews.comment: The upgrade saves your bank, which is good. It didn\'t do that before. I have accumulated about $1.6m since the upgrade. It\'s a great time killer. The thing I don\'t like is when you start a new session it starts the other players with a $5k bank. They don\'t increase until you break someone. If you lose a big pot that player may get removed a little later for a player with a $5k bank. You lose the opportunity to win that money back. Also, some of the calls I see are not realistic.
reviews.author: Jeff Jones

reviews.title: Time killer
reviews.comment: On pro difficulty it\'s still easy, computer doesn\'t bluff so just fold and when in position raise aggressively and they back down unless they have nuts . Still good time killer when on bus or train .
reviews.author: Chris Anderson

reviews.title: Par Excellent
reviews.comment: Enjoy tnxs!
reviews.author: Benito Cotaoco

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: raihan dinus

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: I just want a poker game I can just keep playing without it milking me for money. Was fun until I lost LOL. They should mention limitations in the description. Boo.
reviews.author: Roger Veillon

reviews.title: Screwed
reviews.comment: This is a crazy  app. Sometimes  it lets the other guy Win the $$  when i won  This is crazy
reviews.author: Todd hall

reviews.title: Great games and thanx...
reviews.comment: Good apps..
reviews.author: Mohd Zaid Kamarrudin

reviews.title: Hello
reviews.comment: Dan. Sutton

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Great game

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Tuanmuhd Iruwan

reviews.comment: Enjoyed previous version but this upgrade is ugly and slow, when it works. Now cannot open it, and it won\'t uninstall either! HTC Droid Eris.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: V3 sucks
reviews.comment: Gaudy new bling which is distracting and slows the animations. I was enjoying v2 but hate v3 and stopped playing. Now it refuses to get beyond loading... stage. Galaxy s2, clearing data did not help. Next step, uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay .
reviews.comment: Everytime I close out of it for a while it automatically sends me back to $10,000 with $2000 in my hand , even though I would have so much more than that . Other than that , i enjoy it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daniel
reviews.comment: Bad version of poker. Don\'t stand a chance. The others have thousands in chips to your small stack.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Don\'t have to wait for human players to take all day. Can play as much as you want when you lose your money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad game
reviews.comment: You shouldn\'t time your turn it makes the game suck uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: B.S. Poker
reviews.comment: Great way to pass the time when your sitting on the can. Not to be taken seriously
reviews.author: A Google User
